title: "NON-STOP DODGEBALL!"
body_text:
DRAFT #5 Results from DODGEBALL 146!
Who knew what to expect at this 146th, especially when only a week removed from the explosive encounter between two all-time great competitors, Kevin Adams and Mike Edwards.
Many could consider the
Draft
to be that of a practice round, or better yet, target practice. No stipulations or championships on the line as seen in recent memory, no winner-take-all stakes whatsoever. Good, clean dodgeball fun and excitement as only the warriors of
EastCoastDodgeball
know how. And those in attendance for this fifth random team selection likely weren't complaining at the end of the night.
Flash Results by Game
ONE: 1, 2, 5, 7
TWO: 3, 4, 6, 8
Both armies captured four victories! The match is a draw!
Team ONE
1. Steve Pham - 3. Mike Edwards - 5. Anthony Zambito - 7. Bobby Vetrano - 9. Kevin Megill - 11. Dan Fitzpatrick
Team TWO
2. Juan Londono - 4. John Tronolone - 6. Melissa Kerr - 8. Pam D'Luhy - 10. Mike "Sputz" Krott - 12. Valerie Winston
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: Team ONE fought Team TWO to a 4 - 4 draw. Teams were selected the
Dodgeball Draft
.
Moments & Stars
: Steve Pham out of frustration launching his sneaker over the fence; a vicious thigh shot delivered to Travis "Urkel" Mills
Attendance
: 27, comprised of 18 men and 9 women.
New Players
: Anthony Zambito, Anne Bonner, Danielle Gazonas, Zachary Bergquist
Other Notes
: Zachary Bergquist broke the record for the youngest player in history at just 8 months old. The previous record was that of 3 year-old Gavin Moralski at DODGEBALL 48 nearly two years prior.
DODGEBALL 150 on August 9!
The world finally knows what awaits in less than one month time! Six of the absolute best the game has to offer have been split up into two formidible coalitions
2008's most promising superstar
BOBBY VETRANO
, legendary female powerhouse
ALISON BERTSCH
, and the red-hot Columbian "Cockroach"
JUAN LONDONO
titanically clash with the tough-as-nails rimshot specialist
LAUREN STOPA
, iconic "Greek" himself
TOM ADAMS
, and the first lady of dodgeball
DIANA DIBUCCIO
in the earth-shattering event of the year! Start time is an early 5pm so make every attempt to get your a** to Wall High School on August 9! This is one showcase you don't want to miss.
body_html:
DRAFT #5 Results from DODGEBALL 146!
Who knew what to expect at this 146th, especially when only a week removed from the explosive encounter between two all-time great competitors, Kevin Adams and Mike Edwards.

Many could consider the Draft to be that of a practice round, or better yet, target practice. No stipulations or championships on the line as seen in recent memory, no winner-take-all stakes whatsoever. Good, clean dodgeball fun and excitement as only the warriors of EastCoastDodgeball know how. And those in attendance for this fifth random team selection likely weren't complaining at the end of the night.

Flash Results by Game
ONE: 1, 2, 5, 7
TWO: 3, 4, 6, 8

Both armies captured four victories! The match is a draw!

Team ONE
1. Steve Pham - 3. Mike Edwards - 5. Anthony Zambito - 7. Bobby Vetrano - 9. Kevin Megill - 11. Dan Fitzpatrick

Team TWO
2. Juan Londono - 4. John Tronolone - 6. Melissa Kerr - 8. Pam D'Luhy - 10. Mike "Sputz" Krott - 12. Valerie Winston

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: Team ONE fought Team TWO to a 4 - 4 draw. Teams were selected the Dodgeball Draft.
Moments & Stars: Steve Pham out of frustration launching his sneaker over the fence; a vicious thigh shot delivered to Travis "Urkel" Mills
Attendance: 27, comprised of 18 men and 9 women.
New Players: Anthony Zambito, Anne Bonner, Danielle Gazonas, Zachary Bergquist
Other Notes: Zachary Bergquist broke the record for the youngest player in history at just 8 months old. The previous record was that of 3 year-old Gavin Moralski at DODGEBALL 48 nearly two years prior.

DODGEBALL 150 on August 9!
The world finally knows what awaits in less than one month time! Six of the absolute best the game has to offer have been split up into two formidible coalitions

2008's most promising superstar BOBBY VETRANO, legendary female powerhouse ALISON BERTSCH, and the red-hot Columbian "Cockroach" JUAN LONDONO titanically clash with the tough-as-nails rimshot specialist LAUREN STOPA, iconic "Greek" himself TOM ADAMS, and the first lady of dodgeball DIANA DIBUCCIO in the earth-shattering event of the year! Start time is an early 5pm so make every attempt to get your a** to Wall High School on August 9! This is one showcase you don't want to miss.
